name: Hunting - AI Simulation
description:
This project consists of an AI playing a Hunting simulation game.

The objective is the Hunter to find and kill all the Hunts, which will try to flee from the Hunter.

This is not a game. You can only watch and control the simulation progress.

Buttons & Controls

Loop Button --> Start the simulation in a loop.

Arrow Button --> Play one step of the simulation.

Key '1' --> Decrease loop speed.

Key '2' --> Default loop speed.

Key '3'  --> Increase loop speed.

Key 'R' --> Restart the simulation.

Github repository

https://bit.ly/GithubHuntingAI
